name: The Valley Rule
description:
This is the Original LD Version.

Controls: Move - Arrows Jump - S

There are 4 keys, only 1 way out. Collect power-ups to aid in your navigation "Beneath the surface".

Programming, Art, Design by: Ryan Carag  @raiyum

Music and Sound by: Bill Kiley @Billtron209

Made in 72 hours: http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-29/?action=preview&uid=25829

https://raiyumi.com
